core.name: Ex Machina
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
Ex Machina: Team takes 15.0% less Elemental DMG. MECH-type characters: Basic ATK gains 12.0% Total DMG Multiplier.

subskills.name: Ex Machina
subskills.description: Team takes 30.0% less Elemental DMG. Basic ATKs (including Charged ATKs and Combo ATKs) of MECH-type battlesuits deal 21.0%  more Total DMG.

core.name: Charge: Lightning Phantom
core.description:
Hold [ATK] during the 5-sequence Basic ATK to shuttle through the enemy and enter Supercharged mode.
Charged ATK: Shuttles through the target, dealing 4x150% ATK of Lightning DMG, then enters Supercharged state.
Supercharged state: 5-sequence Basic ATK deals Lightning DMG instead (same amount).

subskills.name: Extrasensory Intuition
subskills.description: Supercharged: Every enemy kill lowers Load by 119

subskills.name: QTE: Mental Torrent
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when enemy is in Time Slow to deal 60%+240% ATK of Physical + 2x300.0% ATK of AOE Lightning DMG and knock enemies airborne. Can be connected into the 5th Sequence of Basic ATK. Enemies hit by QTE are paralyzed. CD: 10s.

subskills.name: Superconductivity
subskills.description: Supercharged: Character deals 30.0% more Lightning DMG.

core.name: Super Discharge
core.description:
Character automatically gain passive bonuses.
Load: Starts at zero (0). Maxes out at 200.
Supercharged: Gain 30% Move Speed but Load increases by 25/s.
Max Load (200): Becomes Depleted, with Move Speed becoming 20% slower.
Depleted: Load decreases by 15/s until zero (0).

subskills.name: Total Sterilization
subskills.description: Character attacks against Paralyzed or Ignited enemies gain 20.0% Total DMG Multiplier.

subskills.name: Pattern Recognition
subskills.description: Team gains 15.0% Elemental DMG when attacking enemies with active shields.

subskills.name: Hostile EWS
subskills.description: Depleted: Load reduces by another 10.0 per 0.4s when there are nearby enemies.

core.name: Stalker Carbon
core.description:
Deploys Stalker Carbon (summoned entity) for 24s (no recast during this time).
Special moves release a Neurotoxin that inflicts Psycho on teammates and enemies.
Affected enemies: Deal +10% Elemental DMG, but have reduced Ignore Interrupt and take 10% more Total DMG from hits.
Affected teammates: Deal +15% Elemental DMG and gain Ignore Interrupt, but take 15% more Total DMG from hits.
CD: 18s. Min. SP: 35. Stalker Carbon consumes SP faster over time, lowers SP regen from attacks by 50%, and exits 3s after SP is depleted.

subskills.name: Command: Kill
subskills.description: Attacks of Stalker Carbon deal 50.0% more Lightning DMG.

subskills.name: Command: Frenzy
subskills.description: Psycho teammates: Elemental DMG bonus is raised to 30.0%, but suffer 30.0% Total DMG Multiplier from hits taken.

subskills.name: Command: Sync
subskills.description: When Stalker Carbon is active, character gains 60.0% Total DMG Multiplier.

core.name: Lightning Reflex
core.description:
Quickly evade enemy attacks. Can be performed twice in a row.
Upon Ultimate Evasion, reduce 30 Load and gains 40% Move Speed for 3s.
Lightning Reflex: Upon Ultimate Evasion, deals 300% ATK of Lightning DMG against the attacker and nearby enemies and paralyzes them for 2s; reduces 80 Load; immediately tap [ATK] to directly unleash the 4th Sequence of Basic ATK.
CD: 15s.

subskills.name: EM Cape
subskills.description: Lightning Reflex CD shortened by 4.0s, and duration of Paralyze is extended to 3.6s.

subskills.name: EMP Blast
subskills.description: Lightning Reflex AOE attack deals 600.0% ATK of Lightning DMG.

core.name: Iron Storm
core.description:
5-sequence scythe sweeps.
1st Sequence: 80% ATK of Physical DMG.
2nd Sequence: 40% + 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
3rd Sequence: 40% + 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
4th Sequence: 50% + 120% + 150% ATK of Physical DMG.
5th Sequence: 4x40% + 200% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Rave of Carnage
subskills.description: Supercharged: Gains Ignore Interrupt; 5-sequence Basic ATK gains 60.0% ATK of Lightning DMG and each sequence inflicts minor Parayze Trauma; takes 30.0% less Physical and Elemental DMG.

subskills.name: Spark Discharge
subskills.description: Any hit from the 5-sequence Basic ATK has a 10.0% chance to deal 60.0% more ATK of Lightning DMG.
